common_1120_rival_01: Whoa, what happened? This place is a mess![npcn:4]

common_1120_rival_02: Why is everything in here all busted up?[npcn:4]

I’m s-s-s-s-s-sorry. Sorry. S-s-s-s-s-sorry.

common_1120_botan_03: Stop that! You’re creeping us out![npcn:8]
common_1120_rival_03:
The professor must be having some...some weird
connection problems or something, huh?[npcn:4]
common_1120_friend_04:
Well, it was definitely weird, at least.
Almost like... I dunno...[npcn:6]
common_1120_botan_04:
If [s;:gs]he meant it as a joke, it wasn’t funny.
I’ve still got goosebumps and all...[npcn:8]
common_1120_rival_04:
Looking at the damage, I have a feeling...maybe
some ferocious Pokémon battled here...[npcn:4]
common_1120_friend_05: That...that was almost like— No, it can’t be...[npcn:6]
common_1120_botan_06:
Have you disabled the lock yet? I’m all for
leaving this place as soon as we can.[npcn:8]
common_1120_stopper_01: Oops! Still got to disable that lock!
common_1120_stopper_out:
Better disable the lock from inside the research
station...
